text: Ishan Pranav Kumar Pandey Kishan (born 18 July 1998) is an Indian cricketer who represents the Indian national cricket team. He is a left-handed batsman and wicket-keeper. Kishan made his international debut in 2021 and has since become a prominent player in limited-overs cricket. Category:1998 births Category:Indian cricketers Category:Living people
title: Ishan Kishan
